text: Hello everyone. I am trying to add a sticky form that will slide down the page as you scroll down. I understand that it needs custom code, but I can’t figure out where to place that code. Can anyone help?
If you're building the page in the page editor you'll go to settings=>advanced and then to the javascript, html and css text boxes
So do I just add the code to this box?
I can’t find one that explicitly says JS and CSS
Oh sorry you'll need to just use <script> tags
I just want the form to stick to the right side when you scroll down.
<https://www.chilipiper.com/request-demo|This> is an example of a page with a sticky form. Just making sure we’re on the same page
I really haven't tested HubSpot sticky forms so I think you'll have to run a couple of tests but I think the above code is pretty close to what you want
Ok thats good to know. Where would I place the code though?
